tool_description: Tracks and analyzes policy amendments, endorsements, and modifications that may affect coverage for a specific date range.

policy_number.description: The insurance policy number to track amendments for

include_endorsements.description: Whether to include endorsements in tracking

coverage_impact_only.description: Only return amendments that impact coverage

effective_on_date.description: Specific date to check amendment effectiveness

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date, and both must be in ISO 8601 format.
Policy not found: Policy number does not exist in amendment tracking system.
Amendment types invalid: One or more amendment types are not recognized.
Date format error: All dates must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Amendment tracking failed: Unable to retrieve amendment history. Check policy number and date range.
usage: Input policy_number, start_date, and end_date to track policy amendments. Optionally filter by amendment_types or specific effectiveness dates. Returns chronological list of policy changes affecting coverage.

amendments_found.description: Number of amendments found in the date range

amendment_list.description: Chronological list of amendments with dates and descriptions

net_impact.description: Overall impact of amendments on coverage (increased, decreased, modified, none)
